pageContext.claim: “Americans will also never tire of defending innocent life. We are aware that many United Nations projects have attempted to assert a global right to taxpayer funded abortion on demand right up until the moment of delivery. Global bureaucrats have absolutely no business attacking the sovereignty of nations that wish to protect innocent life.”
pageContext.analysis: There are three misleading parts to this comment. First, roughly 60 percent of Americans think abortion should be legal in all or most cases, according to research from the Pew Foundation. Second, when speaking about abortion globally, it’s important to recognize that only seven countries around the world allow elective abortion after 20 weeks — though some do have broad exceptions that apply after gestational limits expire. Plus, the vast majority of abortions take place before 20 weeks (a full term is 40 weeks) — not up to the moment before delivery, as Trump suggests.
